name: Cloud Game
description:
Cloudmates is a single player narrative adventure in which a cloud goes on a cross-sky journey to find his missing other half. Players play on PC and use their keyboard to traverse platforms in the 2D sky and avoid various obstacles such as poisonous clouds and sun rays.

UT AET334k - Game Prototyping 

Topic: Narrative driven game prototype

Roles:

  • Presley Hoyl - 
    • Scripting and level design
  • Hari Jeung - Itch Page
    • 2D art [character animation, cut scenes, environment art assets] and level design
  • Matthew Umana - Itch Page
    • Scripting and level design
  • Britney Luong -
    • Level design and 2Dart [environment art assets]
